blogs.title: my first blog
blogs.body: a website where a person writes regularly about topics that interest them, usually with photographs and links to other websites they find interesting
blogs.author: mario

blogs.title: opening party
blogs.body: The Opening Ceremony of the Cricket World Cup 2019 took place on 29 May 2019, at The Mall in central London. The ICC promised that the opening ceremony would be the ‘most celebrated start to a Cricket World Cup ever’. The ceremony included live sport, music and entertainment for a planned 4,000 fans
blogs.author: luigi
